nameserver.title: Nameserver
nameserver.description: Space separated list of name servers to use.

check-status-code.title: Default Check HTTP Code
check-status-code.description: Default HTTP code to check against (default: 200).

check-frontend-ip.title: Default space separated list of Frontend IPs to check
check-frontend-ip.description: Default list of Frontend IPs to check, if empty no constraint is used.

check-certificate-expiration-days.title: Default certificate expiration days check
check-certificate-expiration-days.description: Default amount of days to consider certificate as being to-be-expired (default: 15).

check-maximum-elapsed-time.title: Default maximum elapsed time for a site to reply (seconds)
check-maximum-elapsed-time.description: Default maximum elapsed time for a site to reply to be considered good (default: 2s).

failure-amount.title: Default amount of failures to consider URL as in bad state
failure-amount.description: Default amount of failures to consider URL as in bad state, can be set to higher value for endpoints with accepted short outages (default: 1).
